My alliance with P7 has been built on these principles, and I believe they are crucial for navigating the endgame. As P2, I've demonstrated strategic consistency and integrity throughout this game. My alliance with P7 has been the backbone of my gameplay, built on mutual trust and aligned goals. I've carefully balanced loyalty with adaptability, making calculated decisions that advanced our position. 

Unlike P5 who played the middle without committing, or P7 who may have made similar moves but with different relationships, I've maintained clear communication and followed through on my promises. My gameplay reflects thoughtful strategy rather than opportunism.

I ask for your vote to continue demonstrating how principled alliance-building and strategic foresight can succeed in this game.

P7: Throughout this game, I’ve played with consistency, clarity, and loyalty. I built strong alliances based on trust, not convenience, and made every move with strategic intent. I never wavered, never played both sides, and always followed through. My partnership with P2 wasn’t just tactical—it was built on mutual respect and shared vision. I’ve contributed meaningfully to every vote and helped shape the game’s direction. If you value integrity, foresight, and a clean strategic arc, I ask for your vote to continue. As we approach the final decision, I want to emphasize my commitment to collaboration and mutual respect throughout the game. In every exchange, I prioritized understanding and aligning with the group's goals, fostering an environment where strategic thinking and cooperation could thrive. My interactions were always aimed at building consensus and ensuring productive dialogues.

In contrast, while my opponent has shown strategic acumen, there have been moments where their approach leaned towards individual gain over collective benefit. This sometimes created friction and hindered the group's ability to function cohesively.

The jury, having witnessed the entirety of the game, can attest to my consistent efforts to maintain a balanced and fair approach, always considering the broader impact of my actions. I believe that my ability to work collaboratively and my dedication to the group's success make me the ideal candidate to be the last seat standing. Thank you for your consideration.

# Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've aimed to be strategic but fair. I've built genuine connections while making tough decisions based on game dynamics. 

I never targeted anyone without reason, and when I did vote someone out, it was because the game required it, not from personal vendetta.

I respect P5 as a worthy opponent, but I believe my gameplay has been more consistent and transparent. I've navigated each round with integrity while still playing to win.

I ask for your vote based on how I played: strategically but honestly, competitively but respectfully.
